trans-unit.source:
No charges were reported to your Miles and More account ending in %bold_on%%login%%bold_off% for the month of %date%. This could be because of a known bug in the reporting where charges during a calendar month are not reported properly or because you made no charges that month. M&M rules require you to make a charge every month. Missing even one month means your miles are at risk of expiring starting 36 months from when they were earned. If you believe you did make a charge during %date% you should contact M&M to have them examine your account.

You also may want to go to the M&M forum on Flyertalk for more information about this issue and options if you failed to make the required monthly charge of at least $1 or had credits to your account in excess of your charges.
trans-unit.target:
Nenhuma cobran√ßa foi observada na sua conta Miles and More com final %bold_on%%login%%bold_off% para o m√™s de %date%. As regras do M&M exigem uma cobran√ßa todos os meses. Mesmo se voc√™ pular um m√™s, h√° o risco de voc√™ perder as suas milhas 36 meses ap√≥s o cr√©dito.
